title: Geo
description: The geographic related data where an event was observed.

country_code.title: Country code
country_code.description: The two-character [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://datahub.io/core/country-list) code for the country.

state_province.title: State or province
state_province.description: The state, or province portion of the observation.

postal_code.title: Postal code
postal_code.description: The postal code of the location. Postal codes are not available for all countries. In some countries, this will only contain part of the postal code.

dma_id.title: Designated Market Area
dma_id.description: The Nielsen Media Research designated market area.

msa-id.title: Metropolitan Statistical Area
msa-id.description: The Metropolitan Statistical Area in the USA where the observation occurred.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The signed vertical coordinate of a geographic point.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The signed horizontal coordinate of a geographic point.
